sentences.en: His eyes gave him away, shining with cupidity.
sentences.cn: 他的眼里闪着贪婪的光芒，使他暴露无遗。

sentences.en: It certainly was not worth throw a veil of innocence over such palpable human cupidity.
sentences.cn: 要在这么露骨的人类的贪婪性之上加以无辜的面网,也当然是不值得的.

sentences.en: There was a glimmer of cupidity in those small, cunning eyes of his.
sentences.cn: 他狡猾的小眼睛里露出了一丝贪婪的神情.

trans.tran_en: very strong desire for something, especially money or property
